org.joyrest.aspect

Interface GlobalAspect

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Aspect, Ordered, Predicate<Route>

    public interface GlobalAspect
extends Aspect, Predicate<Route>
    Aspect which is included into the route's AspectChain when the route fulfill a condition from the class Predicate
